subject: Lost order number
description_text:
Good morning/afternoon,

I purchased a set of Plus X p3-h3 pedals on the 2nd January, however I
haven't been emailed or messaged an order number and I am writing to see if
you may provide me with one please.

My name is Dan Brownson, my address is 96 river leys, Swindon village,
Cheltenham, GL519SA. The purchase was £252, and is showing in my Barclays
bank statement as 2nd January 2025.

If you could please assist with this I would appreciate it please.

Kind regards,

Dan.

conversations.body_text: Hi Dan Brownson,  I’ve located your order number as SSN5677. We will arrange shipment shortly, so please don’t worry.

How long does it take to ship these please?

I ordered them 6 days ago and they still haven't been dispatched. When I
paid for express delivery, I was expecting them to arrive within 3-7days,
yet they haven't even been dispatched yet?

Can you please be honest with me about why there is such a delay so I am
not just sat here wondering what is happening with the £252 I have just
spent?

Thank you,

Dan
Hi Dan Brownson,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?
